title: Bernie Sanders: "I will never tell my supporters how to vote. "
subtitle: After Hillary Clinton won the democratic pre-trial phase in 2016, rumors spread that Bernie Sanders told his supporters that if he told them who would vote for them, they shouldn't listen to them.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Bernie Sanders told his supporters that he would never tell those who voted, and that if he did, they shouldn't listen to him.
